Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Citizenship Judge erred in finding that Kohestani did not meet the residency requirement under subsection 5(1)(c) of the Citizenship Act
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Kohestani failed to disclose multiple trips; additional evidence was provided but found unsubstantiated
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to prove 1,095 days of physical presence
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Negative credibility finding due to failure to disclose absences
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Applicant must prove 1,095 days of physical presence in Canada over four years
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged error by Citizenship Judge in residency determination
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Travel records, application forms, supporting documents
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Challenged the reasonableness of the Citizenship Judge's decision
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Allowance of appeal and grant of citizenship
Crimes.Remedy_Sought: Overturning of refusal and approval of application
Crimes.Applicable_Process: Citizenship application review and appeal process
Crimes.Governing_Rule: Physical presence requirement under Citizenship Act

Crimes.Crime_Name: False or Misleading Information in Citizenship Application
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of citizenship application refusal
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Citizenship Judge erred in finding that Kohestani provided false or misleading information by failing to disclose absences
Crimes.Decision_Level: Citizenship Judge level, reviewed by Federal Court
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal from refusal of citizenship application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility finding due to undeclared trips and unreliable evidence
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Travel records, application disclosures, supporting documentation
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: False or incomplete disclosure affecting residency calculation
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to disclose international travel impacting residency claim
Crimes.Application_Error: Omission of travel history in application
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Duty of applicant to provide complete and accurate information
Crimes.Application_Factor: Accuracy and completeness of application details
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of credibility and residency findings
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Citizenship Act – duty to disclose absences
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: False or misleading information through omission of travel
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of credible evidence to support claimed residency
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant deemed not credible due to inconsistencies and omissions
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant challenged the reasonableness of the decision
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Providing false or misleading information in application
